author: brane
msg: Add relpath and URI parameter canonicalization to the JavaHL RA API.
* Path.h (PathBase): Renamed from Path, methods made private.
Removed bogus "copy" constructor that was not used, and was
not in fact a copy constructor.
(Path, URL, Relpath): New classes for specific type of path
* Path.cpp: Implement all of the above.
* CommitEditor.cpp, RemoteSession.cpp: Add apropriate URL or relpath
checks to the native implementations of the RA and editor operaitons.
